ModMetaData.name: Fast Author Confirm (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
This is a continuation of Dazz Aephiex's mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1329690169
--- Original Description --- This mod made it so that you won't have to wait for 6 seconds while uploading something to workshop. Just click "Yes" twice and directly upload.
Incompatibility: None Old Save Compatible: Yes Safely Removable: Yes
